nodes.text: Shoril was a small Gungan town located under a lake of the same name. Consisting of a dozen hydrostatic bubbles, it was in shallow water, and thus could be seen from the surface. By the time of the Clone Wars, Shoril was in a state of disrepair, and the locals believed that Naboo's senator and politicians had broken their promises to help revitalize the town. Although no one at Shoril openly admitted it, the disgruntled populace's sympathies went to the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
Shoril was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
